channel.title: Mariska van Sprundel - Nemo Kennislink on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher
channel.description: Recent content in Mariska van Sprundel - Nemo Kennislink on Terence Dores Cruz - Postdoctoral Researcher

item.title: Meer thuiswerken, minder geroddel
item.description: Interview by journalist Mariska van Sprundel with Prof. Bianca Beersma and Prof. Daniel Balliet that includes discussion of my work on gossip and reputation in everyday life and my work on gossip about Coronavirus published on the popular science website ‘Nemo Kennislink’.
